snippet: Hedi Slimane's first designs for Saint Laurent, including his spring men's wear and a women's resort collection that had not previously been shown to the news media, began appearing in stores this week.
abstract: Hedi Slimane's first designs for Saint Laurent, including his spring men's wear and a women's resort collection that had not previously been shown to the news media, began appearing in stores this week.

headline.main: A First Look at Saint Laurent in the Stores
